titleStmt.title: A testimony concerning the life and death of William Sixmith, being sent with the following matter to London, in order to be made publick.
titleStmt.author: Sixmith, William, 1655 or 6-1677.
Sixmith, Bryan, d. 1679.

notesStmt.note: P. 6 signed: Warington, the 20th of the 1st moneth, 1678 [bracket] Bruen Sixmith.
P. 7-23 are poems signed variously William Sixmith or W.S.
"A letter of William Sixmith to J.D.": p. 23-27.
Wing attributes this to Bruen Sixmith with a publication date of 1677.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Swarthmore College Library.
